channel.title: 317 server need help!
channel.description: i switched the ip from 127.0.0.1 to my servers no-ip and now i can't log onto my server i have DUC running and i've portforwarded please help!

item.title: 317 server need help!
item.dc:creator: @ziniasara ziniasara
item.description:
@ziniasara wrote:

[quote=“RealmofOmens, post:9, topic:413902”]Well most 317 these days require the owner/hoster to log into the 127.0.0.1 server. Being as he can’t log into his server IP I’m guessing he’d have to change it back.

Another question, have you allowed players to log into your current server IP?[/quote]

ive tried but i cant seem to get it online for whatever reason it is.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 server need help!
item.dc:creator: @RealmofOmens RealmofOmens
item.description:
@RealmofOmens wrote:

Well most 317 these days require the owner/hoster to log into the 127.0.0.1 server. Being as he can’t log into his server IP I’m guessing he’d have to change it back.

Another question, have you allowed players to log into your current server IP?

Read full topic

item.title: 317 server need help!
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

[quote=“RealmofOmens, post:7, topic:413902”]I’ll reiterate myself, the owner of the server has to log into the server IP: 127.0.0.1 whilst the players log into the server IP: Yourserver.no-ip.biz

You wont be able to log in if you’re trying to connect to your own server IP, you connect by using the IP: 127.0.0.1[/quote]
Actually when I hosted Old School Prestige I HAD to use 92prestige317377.servebeer.com to log in…

Read full topic

item.title: 317 server need help!
item.dc:creator: @RealmofOmens RealmofOmens
item.description:
@RealmofOmens wrote:

I’ll reiterate myself, the owner of the server has to log into the server IP: 127.0.0.1 whilst the players log into the server IP: Yourserver.no-ip.biz

You wont be able to log in if you’re trying to connect to your own server IP, you connect by using the IP: 127.0.0.1

Read full topic

item.title: 317 server need help!
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

Firewalls, anti-viruses. Disable them all and see if it still doing it.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 server need help!
item.dc:creator: @ziniasara ziniasara
item.description:
@ziniasara wrote:

on canyouseeme.org it shows my port is closed, but idk why i know i’ve portforwarded correctly…

Read full topic

item.title: 317 server need help!
item.dc:creator: @RealmofOmens RealmofOmens
item.description:
@RealmofOmens wrote:

You have to log into 127.0.0.1 which is the home IP address. Because you’re portforwarding off of your modem it is a local host. Your players connect to your server IP e.g. example123.no-ip.biz.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 server need help!
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

Checklist…

1: Have you spelt it correctly in the client?
2: Have you compiled?
3: Have you definitely checked the box?
4: http://www.canyouseeme.org/
5: Check and re-check as the smallest of things can escape us.

Read full topic
